Content.title: Chris Houston
Content.name: Chris Houston
Content.bodyText:
Hi Darren,

I added a comment to one of your other posts related to this, and now I cannot find it, so not sure if it worked or not ?!

Anyway, I have created a short XSLT snippet that converts @names / #names and URL's to clickable links, so I thought it might be something you or those using your package may like to use.

You can find it here:

http://blog.vizioz.com/2009/11/twitter-feeds-in-umbraco-using-xslt.html

Cheers,

Chris
